articles.author: Alicia Wallace, Lisa Eadicicco, Ramishah Maruf
articles.title: Major vulnerability exposed in Amazon’s global internet outage - CNN
articles.description: It took a day without Amazon Web Services for Americans to realize how reliant the internet is on a single company.
articles.content:
It took a day without Amazon Web Services for Americans to realize how reliant the internet is on a single company.
Its not just that people couldnt place mobile orders for coffee at Starbucks or as… [+4628 chars]
